justification: It notes Team B’s preference for deep-threat WRs but ignores B’s contrarian style, dual-threat QB interest, and the RB depth hit from losing their only RB1. The offer is positionally and health-wise coherent (WR1 for RB1) and fits Team A’s urgency, but it under-models B’s incentives and roster balance. Rationale is very brief and light on evidence.
